description.displayText: Vergie has been taking care of our 9mo for the past 4 months and has been wonderful! She's very dependable and so sweet and caring with our little one. We know our baby is safe, fed, and well cared for with her. Would highly recommend!
description.originalText: Vergie has been taking care of our 9mo for the past 4 months and has been wonderful! She's very dependable and so sweet and caring with our little one. We know our baby is safe, fed, and well cared for with her. Would highly recommend!

description.displayText:
Vergie gets my highest recommendation as a care giver, nanny and babysitter! Vergie has been working with our family for several months and took care of our newborn before he went to the daycare. She was not only taking care of the baby, but also helping us managing the household. Two busy parents.. two kids life is hectic, but she made it easy for us to do it all! 
Vergie is always punctual, thoughtful, caring, loving, flexible and easy going. She connects with kids right away! She was going on walks with my baby three times a day int he neighborhood! This was a big deal to us. 
We have had a couple of weeks where my husband was traveling and i had back to back work meetings from early mornings through very late nights and several days in a row. She helped me with my 3yo and 3 mo kiddos.
If I have to do it again, I would absolutely work with Vergie and recommend her to anyone who is looking for a food a reliable nanny that you can trust and count on. 
Vergie loves structure of the day and having a to do list was always helpful to her.
You and your kids will love her!

description.displayText: "VeeVee" helped us out on short notice for 5 days when our regular nanny was out unexpectedly. WE LOVED HER. My boys were telling her they loved her by the end of day one. She took them on long walks, played outside in the rain and heat, and made them plenty of food and snacks. We cannot wait to have her back into our home. She will be our number back up! HIRE HER. You won't be disappointed.
description.originalText: "VeeVee" helped us out on short notice for 5 days when our regular nanny was out unexpectedly. WE LOVED HER. My boys were telling her they loved her by the end of day one. She took them on long walks, played outside in the rain and heat, and made them plenty of food and snacks. We cannot wait to have her back into our home. She will be our number back up! HIRE HER. You won't be disappointed.

description.displayText: I have used Vergie (or VeeVee as my kids lovingly call her) multiple times. She's was there when I needed help with my 2nd born at 3 months and then again early this year to watch my 2 boys 1.5 & 3. She's awesome! She's sweet, nice, and was a real extension of my family. Even my mom loves her! My kids eventually went into daycare but I can't recommend her enough. I have confidently referred her my friends, who also have nothing but great things to say. I met VeeVee when she subbed at my eldest's daycare. He loved her and I just couldn't let her leave without getting her info. It was the best decision I made. Highly recommended
